errors.error_description: The main installation command uses an incorrect package name 'rst-check' instead of 'rstcheck'.
correction_candidates: $ pip install rstcheck
$ pip install rst_check
$ pip install python-rstcheck
$ pip install rst-checker

errors.error_description: A 'Quick Start' section is placed before the 'Installation' section, suggesting the user can run the command before installing the package.
correction_candidates: Move the 'Quick Start' section to be after the 'Installation' section.
Delete the 'Quick Start' section entirely.
Combine the 'Quick Start' section with the 'Examples' section.
Add a note in 'Quick Start' that installation is required first.
errors.golden_answer: Move the 'Quick Start' section to be after the 'Installation' section.

errors.error_description: An unnecessary and incorrect dependency 'check-rst' is listed as a required installation step.
correction_candidates: Remove the line '$ pip install check-rst'.
Change '$ pip install check-rst' to '$ pip install rst-lint'.
Combine the installations into '$ pip install check-rst rstcheck'.
Replace '$ pip install check-rst' with '$ apt-get install rst-checker'.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line '$ pip install check-rst'.

errors.error_description: The example command for checking a C++ file uses a non-existent flag '--check', which will cause the command to fail.
correction_candidates: Change '$ rstcheck --check bad_cpp.rst' to '$ rstcheck bad_cpp.rst'.
Change '--check' to '--file'.
Change '--check' to '-c'.
Change '$ rstcheck --check bad_cpp.rst' to '$ rstcheck < bad_cpp.rst'.
errors.golden_answer: Change '$ rstcheck --check bad_cpp.rst' to '$ rstcheck bad_cpp.rst'.

errors.error_description: The example command '$ rstcheck bad_syntax.rst' refers to a file that does not match the file content ('bad_rst.rst') shown in the preceding code block.
correction_candidates: Change the command to '$ rstcheck bad_rst.rst' to match the file content shown.
Change the file content to be named 'bad_syntax.rst'.
Add a note explaining that 'bad_syntax.rst' is a placeholder name.
Remove the example entirely as it is confusing.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to '$ rstcheck bad_rst.rst' to match the file content shown.
